title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 481 - Contracts Or Agreements For The Construction, Improvement, Extension Or Maintenance Of Utility Plant
content:

State Regulations
§ 481.1 - Filing of proposed contract
§ 481.2 - Subcontract on cost-plus basis
§ 481.3 - Emergency contract
§ 481.4 - Quarterly filing of contract
§ 481.5 - Waiver of rule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 481

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1], 115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
